pageContext.claim: “Ah, it was a very interesting letter. And at some point I may be -- it may be appropriate, and maybe I'll be able to give it to you. ... I haven't seen the letter yet. I purposely didn't open the letter. I haven't opened it. I didn't open it in front of the director.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said he had received a "very interesting letter" from North Korea. Then, minutes later, he said he "purposely didn't open the letter" and hadn't read it. It's not clear why he would call the letter interesting if he hadn't read it.
